member.summary: The method that is executed

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.UserVerbExecutionContext.Target
member.summary: The target object, if any, that the verb is executed on. If the verb is static, this is null.

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.UserVerbExecutionContext.UserContext
member.summary: A user-context that can be filled with custom keys and values. Once filled in the pre-execution context - it is available in the post-execution context.

member.summary: The list of parameters and their values

member.name: T:CLAP.ErrorAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method to be executed when an exception occurs. The method may only accept one parameter of type CLAP.ExceptionContext

member.name: T:CLAP.FileSystemHelper
member.summary: A helper for file reading to allow mocking for tests

member.name: T:CLAP.EmptyAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method to be executed when there is no input. The method must not accept any parameter except if marked along with [Help].

member.summary: Base exception class for all parser exceptions

member.name: T:CLAP.GlobalAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method as a global parameter. The method can either accept any single allowed parameter type or accept no parameters and be treated as a boolean switch.

member.summary: The additional aliases (as CSV) of the parameter

member.name: P:CLAP.GlobalAttribute.Description
member.summary: The description of this parameter

member.name: P:CLAP.GlobalAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of this parameter

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.IVerbInterceptor
member.summary: Gives interception options to verb execution

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.IPreVerbInterceptor
member.summary: Gives interception options to verb execution BEFORE the verb is executed

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.IPostVerbInterceptor
member.summary: Gives interception options to verb execution AFTER the verb is executed, even if the execution fails

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.PostVerbExecutionAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method to run after each verb is executed

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.PostVerbExecutionContext
member.summary: The context after a verb was executed

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.PostVerbExecutionContext.Cancelled
member.summary: Whether the verb execution was cancelled by the pre-execution interception

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.PostVerbExecutionContext.Exception
member.summary: If the verb failed to execute - this contains the exception that was thrown

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.PostVerbExecutionContext.Failed
member.summary: Whether the verb failed to execute

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.ParameterAndValue
member.summary: A parameter and its value

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.ParameterAndValue.Parameter
member.summary: The parameter

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.ParameterAndValue.Value
member.summary: The value of the parameter

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.PreVerbExecutionAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method to run before each verb is executed

member.name: T:CLAP.Interception.PreVerbExecutionContext
member.summary: The context before a verb is to be executed

member.name: P:CLAP.Interception.PreVerbExecutionContext.Cancel
member.summary: Whether to cancel to verb execution. The post-interception will be called having the Cancelled property set to true.

member.summary: A verb execution context

member.name: P:CLAP.VerbExecutionContext.Method
member.summary: The method that is executed

member.summary: The target object, if any, that the verb is executed on. If the verb is static, this is null.

member.name: P:CLAP.VerbExecutionContext.Input
member.summary: The input arguments

member.name: M:CLAP.ParserRegistration.GetTargetType(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to get a registered type by the provided value. The value will first be checked against all of the registered type names, and then if no match is found, by the 'TargetAlias' values applied to the types (if any).
member.param: The name of the requested type or 'null'
member.returns: The matching type, or 'null' if no match is found.
